HEADLINES:

Introducing CIRR: A Coding Bootcamp Coalition to Bring Transparency and Consistency to Student Outcomes
https://www.change.org/p/adopt-a-no-exceptions-policy-for-coding-bootcamp-placement-rate-and-salary-stats #hackreactor


We Are Joining 14 Leading Coding Bootcamps to Fix Student Outcomes Reporting
https://www.change.org/p/adopt-a-no-exceptions-policy-for-coding-bootcamp-placement-rate-and-salary-stats #hackreactor #morethancoding

Starting Today, Student Outcomes Stats Serve the Student, not the School
https://www.change.org/p/adopt-a-no-exceptions-policy-for-coding-bootcamp-placement-rate-and-salary-stats #hackreactor #morethancoding

An Announcement that Will Change the Coding Bootcamp Industry
We Are Joining 14 Coding Bootcamps to Lead a Major Course Correction in the Industry
https://www.change.org/p/adopt-a-no-exceptions-policy-for-coding-bootcamp-placement-rate-and-salary-stats #hackreactor #morethancoding

Hack Reactor & the Largest Coalition of Coding Programs Commit to Truth in Advertising
https://www.change.org/p/adopt-a-no-exceptions-policy-for-coding-bootcamp-placement-rate-and-salary-stats #hackreactor #morethancoding

along with the link to our blog post, and if you can squeeze in any hashtags "#hackreactor" and "#morethancoding" work!
